description: JSON schema for a DOI and its metadata.

creators.description: Required. The main researchers involved in producing the data, or the authors of the publication, in priority order.

titles.description: Required. A name or title by which a resource is known.

publicationYear.description: Required. The year that this resource became publicly accessible. Must be in YYYY format.

resourceType.description: Required. Describes the type of media that the DOI Metadata refers to.
